skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
If anything, this one has an even greater lust for life than they did before their death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Turned for his skill in battle, rabe sought out his killers and returned the favor.

effects.description:
Unit Attribute: "Encourages" For The Forsaken Circle And Abyssal Terror Knights
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

effects.description:
Barrier hit points: +800 For The Forsaken Circle And Abyssal Terror Knights
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
Vlad shares his aberrant immortality with those he trusts, ensuring his legacy endures eternally.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +230
	(armies in local province)

Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: The Dracoins Cataphractii become stronger in the presence of Albrecht and his ancient might.

effects.description:
Ward save: 8% For Ordo Draconis Monsters And Thrall Infantry Units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Vargheists of Caste Drakenhof retain much of their former minds, an effect granted to them by the sheer presence of willpower that is Albrecht.

effects.description:
Barrier hit points: +8 For Ordo Templaris Monsters And Thrall Infantry Units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: The bizzare creatures of the Ordo Profundum instinctively clammor around Ablrecht's might.

effects.description:
Ward save: 8% For All Depth Guard Monsterous Units And Thrall Infantry Units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: They flocked to Albrecht on instinct, sensing something that could help them reclaim some of their former glory.

effects.description:
Ward save: 8% For All Ordo Monsterous and Thrall Infantry Units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: No matter how valiant the effort, all was for naught, for the creature could not be killed.

effects.description: Unit Passive: "Horrible Regeneration"  For The Forsaken Circle And Abyssal Terror Knights

skillTree.localised_description: Regenerative magics course through Albrecht, allowing him to further inspire those around him!
This Vampire Lord feints and shades, confounding their enemy into missteps and errors.
Vlad is borne to battle by powerful, dark effluvia, moving with a speed beyond mortal perception.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

effects.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.localised_description: The first master of the Blood Dragons still walks among their ranks, and sees all that is done in his name.
Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death…

It is not enough to sip the blood of your victims; your Undead form requires far more energy to sustain itself. You become an emotional sink, draining the will and emotion from living creatures around you.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
"See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."
"Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"
The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Strike hard, strike true.
The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit is Undead (does not rout, immune to terror, becomes unstable when Leadership is low).
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

attributes.bullet_text: When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

backgroundSkills.localised_name: Grandmaster Of The Thrall And Monster
backgroundSkills.localised_description: Falling to their thrist is a danger for new and old vampires alike. Albrecht stands watch to shepard the forgotten and damned.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

Vampire Corruption + 5 to local province
